title: Collude: Empowering Artists In Film
description: For 100+ years the film industry has been run by middlemen and agencies. This has kept wages low for artists and returns low for investors.
solution: Collude will provide a platform for all film industry professionals to work together under fair and transparent conditions and arrangements.
experience: Our Team of 10 people has experience in design, software development (i.e NLP-transformer architecture & Fullstack) and the media business
